example.title: Code listing: the result from the previous example
example.programlisting:
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN phone ON ( users.id = phone.user_id ) WHERE users.id = 123
array( 'id' => '123', 'name' => 'John Fulano', 'email' => 'johnfulano@host.com', ... 'phone_number' => '5555-2222', 'phone_ord' => 1, ... ) array( 'id' => '123', 'name' => 'John Fulano', 'email' => 'johnfulano@host.com', ... 'phone_number' => '6666-3333', 'phone_ord' => 2, ... ) array( 'id' => '123', 'name' => 'John Fulano', 'email' => 'johnfulano@host.com', ... 'phone_number' => '7777-4444', 'phone_ord' => 3, ... )
